Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

DD_Attribute_Full.name: dd_version_id
DD_Attribute_Full.definition: This element identifies the version of a PDS dictionary. Current PDS practice is to identify a data dictionary with the identifier used for the PDS Catalog build in which it resides, e.g., pdscat1r47, pdscat1r48, and so on. This keyword will use the upper case representation of the catalog identifier, e.g., PDSCAT1R47, PDSCAT1R48, etc.

Terminological_Entry.name: dd_version_id
Terminological_Entry.definition: This element identifies the version of a PDS dictionary. Current PDS practice is to identify a data dictionary with the identifier used for the PDS Catalog build in which it resides, e.g., pdscat1r47, pdscat1r48, and so on. This keyword will use the upper case representation of the catalog identifier, e.g., PDSCAT1R47, PDSCAT1R48, etc.

DD_Value_Domain_Full.formation_rule:
The values for this keyword must be in the form of PDSCAT1Rxx, where 'xx' is the two-digit version identifier of the Data Dictionary.
Note: The maximum length keyword value is being set at eleven at this time in anticipation of a three digit DD version number being used in the future. At that time, the formation rule will be PDSCAT1Rxxx, where 'xxx' is the three-digit version identifier of the Data Dictionary.
